name: tabmania
description: A simple tab manager enabling some essential keyboard shortcuts

scripts.uglifyBg: uglifyjs --warn --toplevel --output dist/background.js -- src/lib/prod.js src/lib/utils.js src/lib/chromeUtils.js src/lib/SettingsStore.js src/lib/ScheduledJob.js src/tabs.js src/messaging.js src/background.js
scripts.uglifyPopup: uglifyjs --warn --toplevel --output dist/popup.js -- src/lib/prod.js src/lib/utils.js src/lib/chromeUtils.js src/lib/SettingsStore.js src/lib/ScheduledJob.js src/popup/LocalStore.js src/popup/PopupMsgServer.js src/popup/icons.js src/popup/TabViewer.js src/popup/GroupsBuilder.js src/popup/SettingsTabViewer.js src/popup/PopupViewer.js src/popup/TabsTabViewer.js src/popup/TileViewer.js src/popup/TileMenuViewer.js src/popup/popup.js
scripts.dist: npm run uglifyBg ; npm run uglifyPopup ; npm run uglifyInject ; npm run css

author: MarcoDB
